title: Delicious Grilled Hamburgers
ingredients: 1 tablespoon liquid smoke flavoring or less to taste (Optional)
method: Step 2: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil the grate.
Step 3: Combine ground beef, Worcestershire sauce, liquid smoke, and garlic powder in a medium bowl; lightly mix until just combined.
Step 4: With minimal handling, form mixture into three patties.
Step 5: Brush oil onto both sides of each patty, then season with salt.

Step 6: Cook patties on the preheated grill until no longer pink in the center, about 5 minutes per side. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C).
